duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and check-in patients scheduled for imaging services; register demographic information and process payment plans and copays.
Answer phones and handle calls in an efficient and friendly manner.
Act as a liaison between technologists and the patients waiting for exams and relay messages regarding scanner status and other clinic information.
Maintain front office lobby area by straightening magazines, organizing coffee supplies, and assisting with general office clean up.
Maintain supply of patient information sheets.
Complete confirmation calls and provide preparation instructions to patients.
Fax reports, billing information, and medical release forms as requested.
Pre-certify all exams with patient's insurance company and obtain insurance authorization.
Arrange transportation, interpreters, and hotel accommodations for patients when appropriate.
Enter and submit patient exam orders and verify orders match exam schedules.
Schedule referrals, ensure proper authorizations are obtained, and schedule walk-in patients.
Process requests for image orders and CDs from referring physicians and patients.
Maintain an up-to-date and accurate database on all current and potential referring physicians.
